  1: <?php
  2: 
  3: namespace Instagram\Http;
  4: 
  5: /**
  6:  * Response
  7:  *
  8:  * @package    Instagram
  9:  * @author     Hassan Khan <contact@hassankhan.me>
 10:  * @link       https://github.com/hassankhan/instagram-sdk
 11:  * @license    MIT
 12:  */
 13: class Response
 14: {
 15:     /**
 16:      * @var array
 17:      */
 18:     protected $raw;
 19: 
 20:     /**
 21:      * @var array
 22:      */
 23:     protected $meta;
 24: 
 25:     /**
 26:      * @var array
 27:      */
 28:     protected $data;
 29: 
 30:     /**
 31:      * @var array
 32:      */
 33:     protected $pagination;
 34: 
 35:     /**
 36:      * Creates a new instance of `Response`.
 37:      *
 38:      * @param array $meta
 39:      * @param array $data
 40:      * @param array $pagination
 41:      */
 42:     public function __construct($meta = [], $data = [], $pagination = [])
 43:     {
 44:         $this->meta       = $meta;
 45:         $this->data       = $data;
 46:         $this->pagination = $pagination;
 47:         $this->raw        = [
 48:             'meta' => $meta,
 49:             'data' => $data,
 50:         ];
 51: 
 52:         if (!empty($pagination)) {
 53:             $this->raw['pagination'] = $pagination;
 54:         }
 55:     }
 56: 
 57:     /**
 58:      * Creates a new instance of `Response` from a JSON-decoded response body.
 59:      *
 60:      * @param array $response
 61:      *
 62:      * @return static
 63:      */
 64:     public static function createFromJson(array $response)
 65:     {
 66:         $meta       = array_key_exists('meta', $response)       ? $response['meta']       : ['code' => 200];
 67:         $data       = array_key_exists('data', $response)       ? $response['data']       : $response;
 68:         $pagination = array_key_exists('pagination', $response) ? $response['pagination'] : [];
 69: 
 70:         return new static($meta, $data, $pagination);
 71:     }
 72: 
 73:     /**
 74:      * Returns JSON-decoded raw response.
 75:      *
 76:      * @return array
 77:      */
 78:     public function getRaw()
 79:     {
 80:         return $this->raw;
 81:     }
 82: 
 83:     /**
 84:      * Returns `data` from the response.
 85:      *
 86:      * @return array
 87:      */
 88:     public function get()
 89:     {
 90:         return $this->data;
 91:     }
 92: 
 93:     /**
 94:      * If the response has a `pagination` field with a `next_url` key, then
 95:      * returns `true`, otherwise `false`.
 96:      *
 97:      * @return bool
 98:      */
 99:     public function hasPages()
100:     {
101:         return !empty($this->pagination) && array_key_exists('next_url', $this->pagination);
102:     }
103: 
104:     /**
105:      * Returns the next URL, if available, otherwise `null`.
106:      *
107:      * @return string|null
108:      */
109:     public function nextUrl()
110:     {
111:         return $this->hasPages()
112:             ? $this->pagination['next_url']
113:             : null;
114:     }
115: 
116:     /**
117:      * Returns the JSON-encoded raw response.
118:      *
119:      * @return string
120:      */
121:     public function __toString()
122:     {
123:         return json_encode($this->getRaw());
124:     }
125: }
